column6:
Aaron Stack has been drinking again...drinking to keep the ghosts of his past at bay. It wouldn't be a problem if he was just a man-but he's MACHINE MAN, and his past has a way of coming alive! Join 24/7 creator Ivan Brandon and Pride of Baghdad artist Niko Henrichon for the debut of an all-new 5-part Machine Man tale! Plus: CYCLOPS & WOLVERINE go hunting, WEAPON OMEGA battles U.S. Agent, and VANGUARD reveals the truth about the murder of John Doe.,2008,4
Rated A ...$3.99
